video.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
video.synopsis: Meet everyman sportswriter Ray Barone and his family, who get into all manner of situations seemingly designed to drive Ray crazy.

episodes.synopsis: Debra yearns for a peaceful and quiet birthday at home with just Raymond. So he tells his parents and brother that there's no party.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Ray's already in the dog house for not showing more affection, but Debra really gets mad when he talks about their problem with his parents.
episodes.title: I Love You

episodes.synopsis: As Ray is giving the eulogy at his favorite uncle's funeral, his Aunt Alda arrives to rekindle a family feud with Marie.
episodes.title: I Wish I Were Gus

episodes.synopsis: Robert gives Ray and Debra an IQ test as part of his assignment for his criminal psychology class, and the results incite a competition between them.
episodes.title: Standard Deviation

episodes.synopsis: When Angelina, a waitress at Nemo's, catches Ray's eye, he has a lot of explaining to do to Debra. Especially when Ray leaves his wallet at Nemo's.
episodes.title: Look, Don't Touch

episodes.synopsis: Frank gets a few anecdotes published in Reader's Digest and submits his writing samples to Ray's editor hoping to get his own column in the newspaper.
episodes.title: Frank, the Writer

episodes.synopsis: When Ray's parents stop speaking, Marie moves in with Ray and his family, while Frank enjoys his newfound bachelorhood.
episodes.title: Your Place or Mine?

episodes.synopsis: When Ray's in-laws come for a visit, he begs his parents to be nice and accept their differences even though their lifestyles are worlds apart.
episodes.title: In Laws

episodes.synopsis: Ray gets tired of being treated like a kid at his father's poker game, so he ignores his father's advice and ends up losing all his money.
episodes.title: Win, Lose or Draw

episodes.synopsis: Although Marie has always cooked the traditional turkey for Thanksgiving, Debra decides it's her turn to prepare the holiday meal.
episodes.title: Turkey or Fish

episodes.synopsis: When Ray's free time goes to coaching his basketball team in preparation for the championships, he is reminded that his kids are growing up fast.
episodes.title: Captain Nemo

episodes.synopsis: Ray discovers, after many years, that the autographed Mickey Mantle ball he got as a kid from his father isn't authentic.
episodes.title: The Ball

episodes.synopsis: With Debra sick, Ray tries to juggle the responsibilities of home and work -- ending up with chaos and an aborted meeting with Terry Bradshaw.
episodes.title: Debra's Sick

episodes.synopsis: Robert is insecure about his appearance, so when Debra tells him he's attractive, Ray starts feeling insecure about his own looks.
episodes.title: Who's Handsome?

episodes.synopsis: Debra, annoyed at getting stuck with the old car Ray bought from his parents, gets more upset when she discovers that it was his old make-out mobile.
episodes.title: The Car

episodes.synopsis: When Ray discovers that the diamond in Debra's wedding ring is a fake, he finds a way to steal the ring so he can replace the stone.
episodes.title: Diamonds

episodes.synopsis: When their cable goes out and they have nothing but time on their hands, Ray and his family play a game of "Scruples" and argue about honesty.
episodes.title: The Game

episodes.synopsis: Debra tries to change Ray's pessimistic attitude about winning the "Sports Writer of the Year Award," so he agrees to become more upbeat.
episodes.title: Recovering Pessimist

episodes.synopsis: Ray brings home a stray dog that reminds him of the dog he had to give up as a boy due to his allergies, but his brother Robert bonds with the animal.
episodes.title: The Dog that Rocks the Cradle

episodes.synopsis: When Frank's late-night sawing and Marie's meddling bother the neighbors, they meet with Ray to discuss how he'll inform them of their complaints.
episodes.title: Neighbors

episodes.synopsis: A radio psychologist wants to interview Debra for a book on the American family, but she finds the rest of the quirky Barones more interesting.
episodes.title: Facinatin' Debra

episodes.synopsis: When Debra gets fed up with Ray's family intruding in her life, they both reminisce about how quiet life used to be in their old apartment.
episodes.title: Why Are We Here?

episodes.synopsis: Ray is devastated when he discovers his family lied to him about his performance on his television debut on a sports chat show.
episodes.title: Ray's on TV

episodes.synopsis: Ray gets to use the "active technique" he and Debra learned in parenting class on his parents when their stubbornness goes too far.
episodes.title: Father Knows Least

episodes.synopsis: Ray takes his brother, Robert, out for a night on the town. But when Robert wants to get in touch with Ray's feelings, Ray gets uncomfortable.
episodes.title: Brother

episodes.synopsis: When Ally decides to stop taking piano lessons from her Grandma Marie, Ray tries to teach her an important lesson about not quitting.
episodes.title: Mozart

episodes.synopsis: When Ray tricks Debra into letting him play golf, his guilt manifests into an anxiety attack on the golf course. His doctor diagnoses it as stress.
episodes.title: Golf

episodes.synopsis: At a big surprise party for Frank and Marie's 40th wedding anniversary, Raymond is shocked to learn that his parents were once separated for a year.
episodes.title: Anniversary

episodes.synopsis: When Debra fears that Ray is hiding out at work because he doesn't want to spend time with the family, she asks him to start working from home.
episodes.title: Working Late Again

episodes.synopsis: Sick of reading Ally the same stories night after night and in the mood to be creative, Debra decides to try her hand at writing a children's book.
episodes.title: The Children's Book

episodes.synopsis: Ray is feeling guilty about only getting his dad a card for his 65th birthday, so he makes up for it by buying Frank a beautiful, gigantic aquarium.
episodes.title: The Gift

episodes.synopsis: At Debra's insistence, Ray reluctantly takes her to his 20th high school reunion, and it is even worse than he expected.
episodes.title: High School

episodes.synopsis: When Marie crashes and ultimately ruins her Tupperware party, Debra decides that the day has finally come to tell Ray's mom she can't stand her.
episodes.title: The Letter

episodes.synopsis: All Ray wants for Christmas is a little loving from his wife, and he's willing to try anything and everything to have his holiday wish come true.
episodes.title: All I Want for Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Feeling left out when his father selectively asked his brother to join a Civil War re-enactment, Ray voluntarily enlists for the Battle of Gettysburg.
episodes.title: Civil War

episodes.synopsis: When Ray's "Zia Sarina" comes to visit all the way from Italy, he's thrilled to finally meet a relative whom the whole family likes.
episodes.title: Mia Famiglia

episodes.synopsis: When Ray chooses his mother's spaghetti and meatballs over his wife's lemon chicken, Debra gets upset. Ray asks his mom to give Debra cooking lessons.
episodes.title: Marie's Meatballs

episodes.synopsis: When Raymond takes over the family checkbook to prove to Debra how "easy it can be" to balance it, he discovers he is no accountant.
episodes.title: The Checkbook

episodes.synopsis: Raymond goes on a citizen's ride in his brother's patrol car, and after he sees Robert risk his life during a hold-up, he gains a new respect for him.
episodes.title: The Ride Along

episodes.synopsis: Ally insists on sleeping in her parents' bed, so Ray and Debra do everything they can to slay the monsters in her room and get a good night's sleep.
episodes.title: Family Bed

episodes.synopsis: Debra discovers that her mother-in-law, Marie, likes Robert's girlfriend, Amy, better than she likes her because Amy is a "good girl."
episodes.title: Good Girls

episodes.synopsis: Debra brings an "unapproved snack" to Ally's T-ball game, and Ray doesn't stand up for her -- prominently displaying his fear of being disliked.
episodes.title: T-Ball

episodes.synopsis: Robert's traffic school students complain that his class causes insomnia, so he practices on his family members, who turn out to be tougher critics.
episodes.title: Traffic School

episodes.synopsis: Debra tries to teach Raymond how to have a "normal" mid-life crisis, like everyone else, after he starts planning his burial.
episodes.title: Six Feet Under

episodes.synopsis: When Debra gives away all the "baby stuff" at a family garage sale, Ray gets upset that she doesn't want to have any more children.
episodes.title: The Garage Sale

episodes.synopsis: After Raymond asks Debra why she ever married him, they take a walk back in time -- to the very beginning of it all. Raymond is very, very nervous.
episodes.title: The Wedding: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With wedding plans in "runaway train" mode, Ray feels lost amid the endless discussion of veils, bands, appetizers and wedding vows.
episodes.title: The Wedding: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Ray's house is tented for termites, he moves his entire family into his parents' house and gives Frank and Marie a taste of their own medicine.
episodes.title: The Invasion

episodes.synopsis: After Frank has one accident too many, Debra decides that the kids can't ride with him anymore, which makes Ray realize that his dad is getting older.
episodes.title: Driving Frank

episodes.synopsis: Debra decides to get a babysitter. But when Lisa becomes a hit at "Space Station Barone" with her alien-catching game, Debra becomes a jealous mother.
episodes.title: The Sitter

episodes.synopsis: Raymond begrudgingly agrees to be the auctioneer at the Our Lady of Faith School auction for their new playground equipment.
episodes.title: Getting Even

episodes.synopsis: When Debra's mother comes for a visit, Debra realizes just how different her mom's parenting style was from Marie's.
episodes.title: The Visit

episodes.synopsis: After Debra suggests that she might be more consistently romantic if she weren't in charge of the birth control, Ray decides to make a drastic move.
episodes.title: Halloween Candy

episodes.synopsis: Feeling pathetic because he lives with his parents, Robert finally musters up enough courage to move out of his parents' house and live on his own.
episodes.title: Moving Out

episodes.synopsis: It has been Raymond's lifelong dream to get an article published in Sports Illustrated. When his friend Andy sells a piece to them, Ray is devastated.
episodes.title: The Article

episodes.synopsis: Forced to wait home all day for the delivery guy to bring Debra's new curtains, Ray laments to his brother that he can't go out and play golf.
episodes.title: The Lone Barone

episodes.synopsis: Since her parents will be out of the country on Thanksgiving Day, Debra, Ray and the kids make plans to spend the holiday at Frank and Marie's house.
episodes.title: No Fat

episodes.synopsis: Everywhere Ray looks, beautiful, sexy women are coming out of the woodwork to stop by and say "hi" to new tenant Robert.
episodes.title: The Apartment

episodes.synopsis: Ray is overjoyed by the reaction he is getting from friends and family who received a personalized "Barone" toaster from him as a gift.
episodes.title: The Toaster

episodes.synopsis: To settle the score, Ray challenges Frank to a winner-take-all table tennis match after Frank reveals that he purposely threw a childhood match.
episodes.title: Ping Pong

episodes.synopsis: When Marie discovers that Ray held a wild unchaperoned party at their home some 20 years ago, she is hurt that her beloved Ray would have lied to her.
episodes.title: Pants on Fire

episodes.synopsis: Robert's entire demeanor changes when he starts clubbing with his patrol partner, Judy, and her friends. The family finds it hard to believe.
episodes.title: Robert's Date

episodes.synopsis: Frank is elected "Man of the Year" down at the Lodge, and a reluctant Ray and Robert are enlisted to prepare his tribute.
episodes.title: Frank's Tribute

episodes.synopsis: As Frank and Marie are about to embark on a high seas vacation, Frank hurts his knee. Ray, not wanting to disappoint Marie, agrees to accompany her.
episodes.title: Cruising with Marie

episodes.synopsis: When Debra and the kids go away for the weekend, Ray is forced to confront the real reason he doesn't want to stay home alone.
episodes.title: Ray Home Alone

episodes.synopsis: Trying to impress Robert when they visit the Baseball Hall of Fame, Ray uses his "weight" as a sports writer to jump to the front of the line.
episodes.title: Big Shots

episodes.synopsis: Ray confides to Debra that her constant need to cuddle and "be on top of him" when they are sleeping is causing him too many sleepless nights.
episodes.title: Move Over

episodes.synopsis: Debra and Ray feel tremendous pressure to show each other a good time on a romantic weekend getaway in Vermont. Robert babysits the kids.
episodes.title: The Getaway

episodes.synopsis: When Debra gets a part-time job in the big city, Marie is left wondering what's to become of her family now that they will be neglected.
episodes.title: Working Girl

episodes.synopsis: Ray babysits the kids at a park. When Debra sees how helpful he is toward the other mothers, she wants to know why she isn't treated the same way.
episodes.title: Be Nice

episodes.synopsis: After Ray urges Debra to go swing dancing with Robert, he can't believe how infatuated the two become with their new hobby.
episodes.title: Dancing with Debra

episodes.synopsis: When Robert and Amy get caught alone by fellow apartment tenants, they are desperate to find someplace where they can have some time to themselves.
episodes.title: Robert Moves Back

episodes.synopsis: Memories of how they first met come flooding back when Ray and Debra prepare Ally for her first play date with a little boy.
episodes.title: How They Met

episodes.synopsis: Debra is upset when she sees Ray's giddy reaction to her friend's recently enhanced breasts. She wants to know if Ray is content with her body as-is.
episodes.title: Boob Job

episodes.synopsis: Everyone in the family takes sides when Ray and Debra have a senseless argument over a newly purchased can opener which has opened a can of worms.
episodes.title: The Can Opener

episodes.synopsis: Frank starts showing an interest in Ray's work, but his jovial mood and not being his usual cheap self makes everyone question his new behavior.
episodes.title: You Bet

episodes.synopsis: Ray and Debra are discouraged when they realize that their sex life isn't what it used to be. They shrug it off by assuring each other it's normal.
episodes.title: Sex Talk

episodes.synopsis: Upon drafting their wills, Ray and Debra must decide who would make the best guardians for their children. Their choice doesn't meet with approval.
episodes.title: The Will

episodes.synopsis: It's a good indication that something is up when Debra's sister shows up for a visit with rosary beads and prayer cards as gifts for the kids.
episodes.title: The Sister

episodes.synopsis: When Ray hires his overwhelmingly annoying cousin Gerard to assist him, Ray is mortified when Debra points out how alike the two men are.
episodes.title: Cousin Gerard

episodes.synopsis: Ray is bewildered but not altogether displeased when Debra starts initiating sex on a more than regular basis. It's as if they were newlyweds again.
episodes.title: Debra's Workouts

episodes.synopsis: Inspired by how well the Barones got along at Thanksgiving dinner, Debra is intent on finding a way to improve her relationship with Marie.
episodes.title: No Thanks

episodes.synopsis: While discussing the possibility of having to hold Michael back for another year of preschool, Ray is shocked to discover that he too was held back.
episodes.title: Left Back

episodes.synopsis: Ray believes he has found the ultimate Christmas gift for his parents. If nothing else, it will certainly be something they will remember forever.
episodes.title: The Christmas Picture

episodes.synopsis: When Debra raises the notion that Robert's reluctance to commit to Amy may be a result of his being gay, Ray thinks she is beyond crazy.
episodes.title: What's with Robert?

episodes.synopsis: Ray and Debra have differing points of view on how to handle the situation when they learn Ally has been bullying another child on the school bus.
episodes.title: Bully on the Bus

episodes.synopsis: When Ray starts feeling guilty about the good example Frank is setting by attending church, he commits to becoming a regular parishioner.
episodes.title: Prodigal Son

episodes.synopsis: Ray feels guilty when he cancels plans with Robert, who then gets hurt in the line of duty when he should have been hanging out with his brother.
episodes.title: Robert's Rodeo

episodes.synopsis: As Debra and Ray celebrate their 10th anniversary, she discovers that he taped over their wedding video years before with the '91 Super Bowl.
episodes.title: The Tenth Anniversary

episodes.synopsis: Ray screws up a "Hackidu" (à la Pokemon) trade for his daughter, Ally, by giving away a "Scramisaur" card that ends up being worth a lot of money.
episodes.title: Hackidu

episodes.synopsis: Debra throws the Barone family into turmoil when she finally creates a dish that everyone likes. Ray can't believe it when he tastes Debra's braciole.
episodes.title: Debra Makes Something Good

episodes.synopsis: Ray and Debra devise a plan to push Frank and Marie into making some new friends, thus leaving the older couple with less time to bother them.
episodes.title: Marie and Frank's New Friends

episodes.synopsis: Debra realizes that all her time is spent with the kids, Ray and his family. She begs Ray to take the kids out more so she can have more "me" time.
episodes.title: Alone Time

episodes.synopsis: Still recuperating from his recent run-in with a bull, a cantankerous Robert is driving everyone crazy with his mean-spirited and nasty behavior.
episodes.title: Someone's Cranky

episodes.synopsis: When Ray witnesses Debra's annoyed reaction to everything he says and does, he checks the calendar and realizes it's that time of the month.
episodes.title: Bad Moon Rising

episodes.synopsis: No one realized how much of an effect the "bull incident" had on Robert's mental state, including his ability to confront fear and the unexpected.
episodes.title: Confronting the Attacker

episodes.synopsis: While out for a family dinner, the Barones spot Robert's ex-wife, which prompts them to reminisce about the demise of his marriage.
episodes.title: Robert's Divorce

episodes.synopsis: When Marie surprises the family with the news that she's treating them all to a two-week vacation in Rome, everybody loves the idea except Raymond.
episodes.title: Italy Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: When Marie surprises the family with the news that she's treating them all to a two-week vacation in Rome, everybody loves the idea except Raymond.
episodes.title: Italy Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: Ray and Debra lose their cool when Frank and Marie pull the ultimate unannounced visit to their home. Ray finally kicks them out of his house.
episodes.title: Wallpaper

episodes.synopsis: Robert is in the position of having to choose his girlfriend, Amy, ex-wife Joanne or Italian bombshell Stefania to share the future with him.
episodes.title: Meant to Be

episodes.synopsis: When Ray breaks the difficult news to Ally about Pumpernickel's untimely demise, Debra insists that they give the beloved pet a proper burial.
episodes.title: Pet Cemetery

episodes.synopsis: The competition for attention between Ray and Robert reaches an all-time high, with the brothers ending up in a huge fight.
episodes.title: The Author

episodes.synopsis: Meeting Elizabeth again, Ray, wracked with guilt because he feels he didn't behave properly on their high school date, is determined to apologize.
episodes.title: The Walk to the Door

episodes.synopsis: While Frank and Ray are fawning over Erica, Robert's latest conquest, Marie and Debra are fuming over how ridiculous the whole situation is.
episodes.title: Young Girl

episodes.synopsis: While celebrating Thanksgiving, Debra discovers that her seemingly contented parents are really not very happy with each other.
episodes.title: Fighting In-Laws

episodes.synopsis: When Marie hears that Ray is under the weather, she doesn't waste any time in coddling her younger son with homemade chicken soup and intense TLC.
episodes.title: The Sneeze

episodes.synopsis: Ray buys Debra an elaborate Christmas gift in the hopes that she will be so impressed she'll let him go on a weekend golf trip with his buddies.
episodes.title: Christmas Present

episodes.synopsis: When Debra starts choking on a piece of food, she turns to Ray for help -- only to discover that he can't be counted on when it really matters.
episodes.title: What Good are You?

episodes.synopsis: Ray's exhilaration over being sent to cover the Super Bowl is overshadowed by the fact that he must choose who will accompany him to the game.
episodes.title: Super Bowl

episodes.synopsis: When Marie blurts out an embarrassing incident from Ray's past, he can't figure out how she could have possibly known that information.
episodes.title: Ray's Journal

episodes.synopsis: Debra is upset when she realizes during a Valentine's Day dinner with Ray that they no longer have anything to say to each another.
episodes.title: Silent Partners

episodes.synopsis: Ray is upset when he discovers that his twins, Michael and Geoffrey, are playing fairies in the school play, bringing strong criticism from Frank.
episodes.title: Fairies

episodes.synopsis: Robert gets a surprise visit from Stefania, the woman with whom he fell head over heels in love when the Barones vacationed in Italy.
episodes.title: Stefania Arrives

episodes.synopsis: Ray purchases a new state-of-the-art vacuum cleaner from an attractive saleswoman, which ignites a housekeeping war between Marie and Debra.
episodes.title: Humm Vac

episodes.synopsis: Tempers flare when Marie accuses Debra of not returning a borrowed canister that holds sentimental value. Debra insists that she already gave it back.
episodes.title: The Canister

episodes.synopsis: Debra becomes angry when Ray contributes $1,000 to his friends' harebrained scheme to open a go-cart business without first consulting her.
episodes.title: Net Worth

episodes.synopsis: Marie gathers Robert's ex-girlfriends Amy and Stefania and his female police partner, Judy, together so they can dissect his character.
episodes.title: Let's Fix Robert

episodes.synopsis: When Ray realizes that his kids would rather spend time with their Uncle Robert than with him, he decides to do something about the situation.
episodes.title: Say Uncle

episodes.synopsis: Although Debra has been aware her parents were having problems, she is devastated to learn they are planning to separate after 40 years of marriage.
episodes.title: Separation

episodes.synopsis: Frank offers to paint Ray and Debra's house, but refuses to paint it the color they have chosen. Frank's need to be the boss becomes too much for Ray.
episodes.title: Frank Paints the House

episodes.synopsis: When Ray escorts Ally to a dance, he realizes how grown up and independent his daughter has become. He recalls when they welcomed her into the family.
episodes.title: Ally's Birth

episodes.synopsis: Ray and Debra are concerned when they realize the constant bickering that goes on between them and Ray's parents are having an effect on Michael.
episodes.title: The Angry Family

episodes.synopsis: When Ray and Debra sit down to play "Sensuo-opoly," it becomes clear that they have very different approaches to playing the game.
episodes.title: No Roll

episodes.synopsis: Frank forces Marco to choose either Marie or him as a friend. Ray sides with Frank because he doesn't approve of a married woman having a male friend.
episodes.title: Odd Man Out

episodes.synopsis: It's bad enough that Ray lost his ring while away from home, but then an attractive woman at the airport propositions him, thinking that he is single.
episodes.title: Ray's Ring

episodes.synopsis: Ray and Debra are horrified when Marie presents them with an abstract sculpture she made which bears a resemblance to the female anatomy.
episodes.title: Marie's Sculpture

episodes.synopsis: After hurting themselves during a tryst, Ray and Debra lie about their injuries and say they fell down the stairs. Frank decides to fix the stairs.
episodes.title: Frank Goes Downstairs

episodes.synopsis: When Ray realizes that Debra and Marie are scheming together to drive Robert back into Amy's arms, he urges them to mind their own business.
episodes.title: Jealous Robert

episodes.synopsis: While the Barones watch their sons play basketball, Ray finds that Geoff is having trouble getting the hang of the game.
episodes.title: It's Supposed to Be Fun

episodes.synopsis: It's the first Thanksgiving since Debra's parents got divorced, and Debra is thrilled both her parents have agreed to have dinner with them.
episodes.title: Older Woman

episodes.synopsis: Robert meets a beautiful woman who is a big fan of Ray's sports column. When the woman mistakes Robert for Raymond, Robert doesn't set her straight.
episodes.title: Raybert

episodes.synopsis: While enjoying a college football game, Frank catches a football from a record-setting field goal and refuses to give it back to the kicker.
episodes.title: The Kicker

episodes.synopsis: When Marie receives a letter from a relative detailing how wonderful her life is and how well her kids are doing, it drives her insane with jealousy.
episodes.title: Season's Greetings

episodes.synopsis: When Debra begrudgingly agrees to let him be more involved in the daily decision making, Ray starts grocery shopping for things that he likes.
episodes.title: Tissues

episodes.synopsis: Held captive at Frank and Marie's during a snowstorm, Debra, Ray and Amy actually find themselves having a great time trapped together.
episodes.title: Snow Day

episodes.synopsis: When Ray learns that Peggy and her daughter have targeted his parents' house as a spot to make their big sale during the competition, it's war.
episodes.title: Cookies

episodes.synopsis: Robert is ecstatic when he is recommended for the FBI job -- that is, until it becomes apparent that Marie's intrusive ways may be his undoing.
episodes.title: Lucky Suit

episodes.synopsis: Thinking it would be hilarious to show a typical day in the life of Frank and Marie, Ray and Debra do an impersonation that brings down the house.
episodes.title: The Skit

episodes.synopsis: When Debra stumbles across a cassette tape that contains a message from Ray's ex-girlfriend, she wants to know why he has saved it all of these years.
episodes.title: The Breakup Tape

episodes.synopsis: Ray is ready to speak with Ally about the facts of life, only to find Ally's interest has changed from where babies come from to the meaning of life.
episodes.title: Talk to Your Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Debra decides to run for school president, but Ray isn't sure he can handle the twins by himself during all those meetings -- so he votes against her.
episodes.title: A Vote for Debra

episodes.synopsis: When Ray finally feels comfortable enough to call Debra's mother "mom," he wants Debra to reciprocate and start calling Marie "mom."
episodes.title: Call Me Mom

episodes.synopsis: Debra takes offense when Marie accuses her of being rude, and the two women wind up fighting and not speaking to each other.
episodes.title: Mother's Day

episodes.synopsis: When Debra accuses Ray of still not being able to pick up on her "not in the mood" signals, they fondly recall the first night they spent together.
episodes.title: The Bigger Person

episodes.synopsis: Now that Debra and Ray's mom aren't speaking to each other, Debra goes out of her way to ensure that Ray doesn't spend time with his mother.
episodes.title: The First Time

episodes.synopsis: This exciting clip episode contains the most memorable moments from the Seasons 1 through 6 of "Everybody Loves Raymond."
episodes.title: The First Six Years

episodes.synopsis: Depressed that Marie and Debra can't seem to resolve their differences, Robert decides to join a support group that the family believes is a cult.
episodes.title: The Cult

episodes.synopsis: After arguing with Ray over his inability to help her with housework, Debra becomes intrigued when her friends suggest they see a marriage counselor.
episodes.title: Counseling

episodes.synopsis: When Ally's teacher overhears Ray commenting about the kids' excessive workload, she invites Raymond to address the curriculum review board.
episodes.title: Homework

episodes.synopsis: When the twins doodle on the back of Ray's eulogy and give it to Marie and Frank, Ray attempts to recover the picture before Frank finds out.
episodes.title: Pet the Bunny

episodes.synopsis: After Ray and Debra spend an evening apart, Ray admits he no longer enjoys his juvenile pursuits with his friends on boys' nights.
episodes.title: Who Am I?

episodes.synopsis: After lending Robert $1,000 when he complains he's struggling with finances, Ray and Debra are surprised when he goes on a vacation to Vegas.
episodes.title: Robert Needs Money

episodes.synopsis: Debra indicates she's tired of sharing all her space with Ray, so he decides to give her exclusive use of their bathroom.
episodes.title: The Sigh

episodes.synopsis: Ray and Debra are excited to have met a couple who are just like them, but Ray has mixed feelings when their son wreaks havoc around the house.
episodes.title: The Annoying Kid

episodes.synopsis: Robert is excited because he's dating a great new woman and hints to Ray and Debra that she might even be "the One."
episodes.title: She's the One

episodes.synopsis: While Raymond, Robert and Frank don't want to bring up the fact Marie is having vision trouble, Debra suggests she visit an eye doctor.
episodes.title: Marie's Vision

episodes.synopsis: Raymond lies and tells Debra that he's already bought her an incredibly thoughtful Christmas gift, as he frantically tries to figure out what to get.
episodes.title: The Thought That Counts

episodes.synopsis: Frank must find a way to fix his image with Ally when she catches him "sampling" some of the trail mix at the supermarket.
episodes.title: Grandpa Steals

episodes.synopsis: When Ray's pal gets a job booking guests for a local sports radio show, Ray offers to appear as a guest, only to find out the show's host hates him.
episodes.title: Somebody Hates Raymond

episodes.synopsis: When Robert decides to propose to Amy, he confides his decision to Raymond and then convinces Ray to accompany him to meet Amy's parents.
episodes.title: Just a Formality

episodes.synopsis: Tired of being labeled the "evil witch" around the house, Debra convinces Ray that it's his turn to discipline the kids.
episodes.title: The Disciplinarian

episodes.synopsis: Ray starts spending much less time at home when he volunteers at the hospital and becomes a hit with many of the patients.
episodes.title: Sweet Charity

episodes.synopsis: Robert is caught in a compromising position by Amy's conservative parents when they arrive unexpectedly at her apartment.
episodes.title: Meeting the Parents

episodes.synopsis: Robert is put in charge of selecting his wedding invitations; Ray suggests he botch it so Amy will let him off the hook with their wedding plans.
episodes.title: The Plan

episodes.synopsis: When Debra is too sick to take Ally to a sleepover, Ray reluctantly agrees to take her despite the fact he must come face-to-face with his nemesis.
episodes.title: Sleepover at Peggy's

episodes.synopsis: Debra gets annoyed with Ray when he seems pleased that she's picked one of her attractive friends to replace her if she dies.
episodes.title: Who's Next

episodes.synopsis: Debra throws a bridal shower for Amy, but her good intentions get sidetracked by Marie's usual overzealous participation.
episodes.title: The Shower

episodes.synopsis: Ray and Debra are locked in an "unspoken" battle of wills over who should put a suitcase away after a weekend trip.
episodes.title: Baggage

episodes.synopsis: Debra and Marie give Raymond a guilt trip when they find out that the bachelor party he hosted for Robert was a huge disappointment.
episodes.title: The Bachelor Party

episodes.synopsis: When Peter attempts to bury the hatchet between himself, Robert and Ray, Robert suspects he's up to no good and assigns Ray to keep an eye on him.
episodes.title: Robert's Wedding

episodes.synopsis: When the twins wind up having a great time with Ray on the golf course, Debra admits to Ray that she's upset they don't have fun together anymore.
episodes.title: Fun with Debra

episodes.synopsis: Amy becomes annoyed that Marie is already asking when she's going to send out their thank-you notes from the wedding.
episodes.title: Thank You Notes

episodes.synopsis: When Michael stays home from school for two days in a row, Ray suspects he has homework he hasn't finished, but Michael claims that's not the case.
episodes.title: Home From School

episodes.synopsis: When Debra and Ray become embroiled in an argument in front of Robert, he tells Ray that to find happiness, he needs to be more affectionate.
episodes.title: Misery Loves Company

episodes.synopsis: Debra is pleased when she finds out Gianni can install a new stove in their kitchen, but the thrill of having a contractor in the house gets old fast.
episodes.title: The Contractor

episodes.synopsis: Robert tries to be civil with his houseguest but loses it when Peter confronts him in front of Ray and Debra about why he is being treated poorly.
episodes.title: Peter on the Couch

episodes.synopsis: When Ray lies to his mother to get out of spending the evening with her, the lie grows when Debra and the twins cover for him.
episodes.title: Liars

episodes.synopsis: After Debra's mother suggests throwing Debra an "old-fashioned English tea party," Ray reluctantly agrees after she promises to do all the work.
episodes.title: The Surprise Party

episodes.synopsis: When the Barones arrive at the Pennsylvania home of Amy's parents, they find that their family traditions encourage lots of lively conversation.
episodes.title: The Bird

episodes.synopsis: Ray brings Frank a bag of CDs of all his jazz records, but they wind up in the basement with a stack of electronic gifts that Frank never uses.
episodes.title: Jazz Records

episodes.synopsis: When Ray arrives to find Debra having a great time singing and drinking with Frank's friends, he can't help but mock her new geriatric social circle.
episodes.title: Debra at the Lodge

episodes.synopsis: After mistakenly leaving Michael and Geoffrey home alone, Debra and Ray race home and discover that Ally stepped in to take care of the boys.
episodes.title: Slave

episodes.synopsis: After realizing that Debra places bets with the kids on his questionable behavior traits, Ray is disgusted his own children now think he's a doof.
episodes.title: Whose Side Are You On?

episodes.synopsis: When Debra assures Ray she'll be on time for an important awards dinner, Ray decides to hope for the best and waits for her.
episodes.title: Lateness

episodes.synopsis: Ray objects to buying Ally an expensive dress to wear to a friend's formal birthday party.
episodes.title: Party Dress

episodes.synopsis: Robert gets caught in the middle of a tough situation when Marie and Amy argue about whether he should retire from the police force.
episodes.title: Security

episodes.synopsis: After including stories about Robert, Frank and Marie in his speech, Ray is horrified when Amy clues him in on his huge omission.
episodes.title: The Ingrate

episodes.synopsis: Amy's parents put Robert on the defensive when they point out his strange habit of touching food to his chin before he eats it.
episodes.title: Crazy Chin

episodes.synopsis: When the MacDougalls are invited to spend Easter with the Barones, the families attempt to bond over a 500-piece puzzle.
episodes.title: The Nice Talk

episodes.synopsis: When Robert informs Ray that Amy filled him in on some juicy gossip about him, Ray decides to get even with Debra by sharing some secrets of his own.
episodes.title: Blabbermouths

episodes.synopsis: After a modeling agent tells Robert he has a unique look, he convinces him to pose for head shots with their "in-house" photographer.
episodes.title: The Model

episodes.synopsis: A young man, Sam Gilula, arrives at Frank and Marie's house and everyone is surprised when he and Frank fondly embrace each other.
episodes.title: The Mentor

episodes.synopsis: Robert and Ray end up with the mother of all guilt trips when they decide not to help Marie so they can land a prime spot on the golf course.
episodes.title: Golf For It

episodes.synopsis: After Frank and Marie have a great time visiting old friends, they deliver shocking news to the family they have decided to buy a condo in New Jersey.
episodes.title: The Home

episodes.synopsis: Amy puts her personal touch on their newly acquired home. Ray and Debra visit Marie and Frank for the third time in two weeks.
episodes.title: Not So Fast

episodes.synopsis: After Debra and Marie fight, Ray craftily turns misfortune into a night of passion by helping Debra channel her emotions into angry sex.
episodes.title: Angry Sex

episodes.synopsis: Following a PTA meeting, Debra comments on Ray's sloppy attire, and Ray tells Debra that he overheard one of the mothers say that she looked "trampy."
episodes.title: P.T. & A

episodes.synopsis: Debra and Ray are astonished when Ally comes home with an F in math on her report card, so they set up a meeting with Ally's math teacher.
episodes.title: Ally's F

episodes.synopsis: Debra, Amy and Marie, worried about the men's relationships, convince Ray and Frank to accompany Robert to see his therapist, Dr. Greenberg.
episodes.title: Boys' Therapy

episodes.synopsis: Debra invites her divorced parents to Thanksgiving dinner. Marie agrees to let Lois stay with her while Warren sleeps in Ray and Debra's bed.
episodes.title: Debra's Parents

episodes.synopsis: Wondering why Marie is being extra nice to Robert and Amy, Ray discovers her plan: She wants more grandchildren from them.
episodes.title: A Job for Robert

episodes.synopsis: Amy's parents are concerned Peter is lonely and should start a family. Ray unwillingly goes to Peter's to give him dating advice and encouragement.
episodes.title: A Date for Peter

episodes.synopsis: Ray frantically rummages through the kitchen drawer so he can show Andy and Gianni his personalized letter from Muhammed Ali.
episodes.title: Favors

episodes.synopsis: Ray is dumfounded when he realizes the magnitude of the blunder he made while at a Knicks game with Michael and Geoffrey's friend Chris.
episodes.title: The Faux Pas

episodes.synopsis: Marie is astounded when Frank puts salt on her lasagna. While Debra and Amy console Marie, Ray and Robert discover Frank lost his sense of taste.
episodes.title: Tasteless Frank

episodes.synopsis: Ray tells Robert that Amy is a chatterbox because she wouldn't stop talking to him while he was watching a basketball game.
episodes.title: Sister-in-Law

episodes.synopsis: Ray decides to watch the overtime of a basketball game instead of having sex with Debra. The next day he denies her again.
episodes.title: The Power of No

episodes.synopsis: Robert is shocked when he catches Pat smoking a cigarette but is thrilled to be part of Pat's dirty secret and seizes this opportunity to bond.
episodes.title: Pat's Secret

episodes.synopsis: Ray is admitted to the hospital for minor surgery, but unexpectedly falls into a coma. The family experiences a number of heartwarming flashbacks.
episodes.title: The Finale
